ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | recxpcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | recxpcld.2 | |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) |
| 3 |  | recxpcld.3 | |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | mulcxpd.4 | |- ( ph -> 0 <_ B ) |
| 5 |  | mulcxpd.5 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_mulcxp | |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) /\ ( B e. RR /\ 0 <_ B ) /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A x. B ) ^c C ) = ( ( A ^c C ) x. ( B ^c C ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_syl221anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) ^c C ) = ( ( A ^c C ) x. ( B ^c C ) ) ) |
